item.title: A Full Guide to Energy
item.description: Prerequisites Read the Grounding your energy article before starting this course. Thank you! Developing your Toolset 1. Perception The first thing you should learn is how your mind signatures energy.

item.title: Grounding your energy ðŸŒ´
item.description: Grounding oneself energetically is a practice that can help to reduce stress and anxiety, and increase feelings of calm and clarity. It can also be helpful for connecting with the present moment and the physical world.
